subject: Algarve Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Abby Wambach scored her 154th goal and Rachel Buehler scored in her 100th appearance as the United States rebounded from a sluggish first half to beat Iceland, 3-0.
snippet: Abby Wambach scored her 154th goal and Rachel Buehler scored in her 100th appearance as the United States rebounded from a sluggish first half to beat Iceland, 3-0.
